snippet: While conservative evangelicals are prominent on television, the liberal wings of Christian churches have their own leading preachers.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column notes evangelicals are not the only ones with high-profile preachers with sizable audiences; points out liberal wings of certain Christian churches also have preaching stars, and some gathered In Minneapolis in May for the annual Festival of Homiletics, conference that offers sermons and lectures on art of preaching.
lead_paragraph: While conservative evangelicals are prominent on television, the liberal wings of Christian churches have their own leading preachers.

headline.print_headline: Festival Draws Stars of Christian Preaching (Not as Seen on Television)
headline.main: Festival Draws Stars of Christian Preaching (Not as Seen on Television)
